catalog_script_client.name: Show Justification if Banned

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_c11eb6012f473010dfa35e072799b66d
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Request Travel">c0e8ee892fc33010dfa35e072799b688</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:18e82ac92fc33010dfa35e072799b676</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Show Justification if Banned</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }
	
	g_form.addInfoMessage("Running Client Script Now");
	g_form.addInfoMessage("Your new value is: " + newValue);
	g_form.addInfoMessage("Is it banned? - " + g_form.getBooleanValue('destination.banned'));
    if (newValue.banned) {
		g_form.addInfoMessage("Made it into if statement");
        g_form.setVisible('justification');
		g_form.setMandatory('justification');
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>kennedy.hall</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-10-05 19:06:29</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c11eb6012f473010dfa35e072799b66d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Show Justification if Banned</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="International Travel" source="x_684922_int_trav">fd7e917f2f323010dfa35e072799b6d1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="International Travel">fd7e917f2f323010dfa35e072799b6d1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_c11eb6012f473010dfa35e072799b66d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kennedy.hall</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-10-05 19:11:46</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
